languages.text: "И не говорите. Я до сих пор потрясен его словами". {n}Если Соломон и испытывает некоторое потрясение, его лицо остается непроницаемым.{/n}
"You can say that again. I am still baffled myself." {n}Whether or not Solomorne is in any state of bafflement at all, his face remains impenetrable.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И не говорите. Я до сих пор потрясен его словами". {n}Если Соломон и испытывает некоторое потрясение, его лицо остается непроницаемым.{/n}

"You can say that again. I am still baffled myself." {n}Whether or not Solomorne is in any state of bafflement at all, his face remains impenetrable.{/n}

languages.text: 「まったくです。私自身も、まだ混乱してるくらいです」{n}ソロモーンが本当に混乱しているのかどうかは定かではない。彼の表情は相変わらず読み取れないままだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can say that again. I am still baffled myself." {n}Whether or not Solomorne is in any state of bafflement at all, his face remains impenetrable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「まったくです。私自身も、まだ混乱してるくらいです」{n}ソロモーンが本当に混乱しているのかどうかは定かではない。彼の表情は相変わらず読み取れないままだ。{/n}

languages.text: "Das könnt Ihr laut sagen. Ich bin noch immer ganz perplex." {n}Ob Solomorne tatsächlich perplex ist oder nicht, lässt sich seiner steinernen Miene nicht entnehmen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can say that again. I am still baffled myself." {n}Whether or not Solomorne is in any state of bafflement at all, his face remains impenetrable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das könnt Ihr laut sagen. Ich bin noch immer ganz perplex." {n}Ob Solomorne tatsächlich perplex ist oder nicht, lässt sich seiner steinernen Miene nicht entnehmen.{/n}

languages.text: « J'ai pensé la même chose. Je vous avoue que j'en suis encore ébahi. » {n}Si Solomorne est ébahi, son expression n'en reste pas moins impénétrable.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can say that again. I am still baffled myself." {n}Whether or not Solomorne is in any state of bafflement at all, his face remains impenetrable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'ai pensé la même chose. Je vous avoue que j'en suis encore ébahi. » {n}Si Solomorne est ébahi, son expression n'en reste pas moins impénétrable.{/n}

languages.text: «Y usted que lo diga. Yo mismo apenas doy crédito». {n}Tanto si Solomorne da algún crédito o no, su rostro permanece impasible.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can say that again. I am still baffled myself." {n}Whether or not Solomorne is in any state of bafflement at all, his face remains impenetrable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y usted que lo diga. Yo mismo apenas doy crédito». {n}Tanto si Solomorne da algún crédito o no, su rostro permanece impasible.{/n}

languages.text: “是啊，这话一点都没错，我自己都有些困惑。”{n}虽然你不清楚索罗蒙心里是否真的很困惑，但他脸上没有流露出任何感情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can say that again. I am still baffled myself." {n}Whether or not Solomorne is in any state of bafflement at all, his face remains impenetrable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是啊，这话一点都没错，我自己都有些困惑。”{n}虽然你不清楚索罗蒙心里是否真的很困惑，但他脸上没有流露出任何感情。{/n}

languages.text: "Aynen öyle. Hâlâ şaşkınım." {n}Solomorne'un ifadesiz yüzünden şaşkın olup olmadığı anlaşılmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can say that again. I am still baffled myself." {n}Whether or not Solomorne is in any state of bafflement at all, his face remains impenetrable.{/n}
